Posts.Content: pamh wrote: I finished radiation Nov 5, 2007 and I have notices a soreness in my breast for about the last week or 2.  It is not enough to stop my usual activities but when I am taking off my bra I seem to notice it the most.  I had a lumpectomy and no chemo.  I'm on arimidex now.  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: soreness 6 weeks later pamh tupee

Posts.Content: Dec 24, 2007 01:07PM pamh wrote: It seems to be tender below the collar bone twd the armpit area.  The breast area where my tumor was is tender too.  This is the last place where the radiation was focused.  The rad oncologist did say I had some inflammation remaining when I saw him the first part of Dec.  I didn't realize it would last this long.  If it doesn't get better I'll get it checked out.  Thanks ps: What do you do about the costochronditis?  Is that something you just wait out?
Posts.Title: soreness 6 weeks later pamh tupee
